PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-15752010-12-09,  ,  ,  AAFC, 
ActHealth of Animals Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Health of Animals Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the HEALTH OF ANIMALS REGULATIONS to address regulatory gaps and to implement Canada's National Aquatic Animal Health Program (NAAHP). Federal intervention is required to meet international trade standards and prevent loss of aquatic resources due to disease introduction or spread. The amendments add aquatic animals and diseases of federal and international significance to the regulatory framework currently applied to terrestrial animals. The regulatory changes require the CFIA to be informed of the presence of listed diseases and implement controls to prevent these diseases from being introduced into, or spread within, Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0296 Publication Date: 2010-12-22
